title: Dungeon ni Deai wo Motomeru no wa Machigatteiru Darou ka Movie: Orion no Ya
title_english: Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon?: Arrow of the Orion
title_japanese: 劇場版 ダンジョンに出会いを求めるのは間違っているだろうか -オリオンの矢-
title_synonyms: Is It Wrong That I Want to Meet You in a Dungeon Movie
synopsis: Continuing his adventure to get stronger in order to traverse deeper into the "Dungeon," Bell Cranel wanders the Orario city streets with his friends and the goddess Hestia. That evening, the city is filled with stalls and games as it celebrates the Holy Moon Festival. Hermes, a god, hosts one such activity where participants are asked to pull a spear embedded in a crystal boulder; those who succeed will receive a special gift: a trip around the world and a divine blessing from the gods! Bell and his merry group challenge one another to claim the prize. But behind the facade of an innocent party game lies a preface for a daring quest ahead. [Written by MAL Rewrite]

Parent story.name: Dungeon ni Deai wo Motomeru no wa Machigatteiru Darou ka

ending_themes: "Onaji Sora no Shita de (おなじ空の下で)" by Yuka Iguchi
